title: Antarctica and Atlantis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/4/20
itunes:title: Antarctica and Atlantis - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/4/20
description:
George Noory and author Thomas Greanis explore his novels and research into Antarctica, whether the remains of the ancient civilization of Atlantis may be buried below the ice, and why most of the landscape has never been explored.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
